content.raw: I'll try to submit a pull request for my camera server tomorrow, which I think will inform the decision to subclass (although I have never used BIAS, so...). Getting a higher frame rate by reducing sensor read out area is a fairly generic CCD/CMOS trait and so this adjustment should be useful to many experiments.
